Scripts.OnLoad: local FrameName = self:GetName(); local lastButton = _G[FrameName.."Button1"] for i=2,11 do local Button2 = CreateFrame("Button",FrameName.."Button"..i,self,"TinomReplaceListButtonTemplate") Button2:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", lastButton ,"BOTTOMLEFT", 0, 0) Button2:SetPoint("RIGHT", self ,"RIGHT", -26, 0) lastButton = Button2; end

Scripts.OnShow: self.Text:SetText("关闭脏话过滤"); if GetCVarInfo("profanityFilter") == "1" then self:SetChecked(false) else self:SetChecked(true) end
self.Text:SetText("原汁原味(需重启)"); if GetCVarInfo("overrideArchive") == "1" then self:SetChecked(false) else self:SetChecked(true) end
self.Text:SetText("聊天框职业染色名"); if GetCVarInfo("chatClassColorOverride") == "1" then self:SetChecked(false) else self:SetChecked(true) end
